nodes.text: The Atterra Belt was an asteroid field located in the Outer Rim Territories' Atterra system. During the First Order/Resistance War, the MG-100 StarFortress SF-17 Cobalt Hammer traveled through the Atterra Belt and engaged several TIE fighters. The larger asteroids in the Belt were visible from the surface of Atterra Bravo, and appeared brighter than stars.
